title: [GAMEPLAY] Noct ult hides ally teemo shrooms
body:
Intended ?

Last game enemy {{champion:56}} ulted and I was infront of an allied {{champion:17}} shroom, the shroom disappeared entirely ( not just on the map ) until his ult ended.

replies.body: Oh, as the reason why this mattered. I was playing {{champion:64}} and so the shroom infront of me disappeared, I don't think I can target it even if it still exists. ( W )
